response.overview: Meet the real-life airmen who inspired Masters of the Air as they share the harrowing and transformative events of the 100th Bomb Group.
response.tagline: The true story of the men who inspired Masters of the Air.
response.title: The Bloody Hundredth

titles.title: 浴血之师：第100轰炸机大队
